name: part_013
file: tmp_【#天音かなた卒業ライブ】「絶対的アイドル」 ⧸ Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE ＂THE ABSOLUTE IDOL＂【hololive】 [8iGGL_0CEpc]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata giving an emotional final MC on stage, thanking fans and introducing her song.
Kanata performing her original song 'Kiseki Musubi' on a stage with changing lights.

subtitles.original: たくさん聴いてくれたおかげと言いますか
subtitles.english: I guess I should say it's thanks to you listening so much,

subtitles.original: 本当にありがとうございます 思っています
subtitles.english: but I truly thank you. I really mean it.

subtitles.original: みんなね あの この後ですね あの 22時10分から最後の歌ってみた...
subtitles.english: Everyone... um... after this, at 22:10, the final cover video...

subtitles.original: みんなと約束してました
subtitles.english: I promised you all.

subtitles.original: あの動画消えちゃって 歌い直そうって言っていたね あのKINGを
subtitles.english: Since that video disappeared and I said I'd resing it... that 'King'...

subtitles.original: 投稿するので 絶対見てくださいね！
subtitles.english: I'm uploading it, so please definitely watch it!

subtitles.original: 毎日一緒にいてくれたへい民
subtitles.english: To the Heimin who were with me every day,

subtitles.original: ホロライブの大好きなメンバーたち
subtitles.english: my beloved Hololive members,

subtitles.original: そしてたくさん支えてくださった 本当にお世話になった方々
subtitles.english: and to everyone who supported me and took such good care of me,

subtitles.original: 全ての方に感謝しています
subtitles.english: I am grateful to all of you.

subtitles.original: 夢のような時間は本当にありがとうございました
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for this dream-like time.

subtitles.original: 心... くちゅ... ここで噛むんね
subtitles.english: My hear... *sniffle*... I stutter here, don't I?

subtitles.original: 子供の頃のアイドルになりたいという夢も
subtitles.english: My childhood dream of becoming an idol,

subtitles.original: 作詞作曲をしてみたいという夢も 叶いました
subtitles.english: and my dream of trying songwriting and composing, both came true.

subtitles.original: そして 最後の曲ですが まだ歌うんですよ
subtitles.english: And now, for the final song... I'm still going to sing, you know!

subtitles.original: 僕が初めて作詞作曲した楽曲があります
subtitles.english: There is a song I wrote and composed for the first time.

subtitles.original: 今はいない同期 ココの卒業に合わせて
subtitles.english: Matching the graduation of my genmate Coco, who isn't here now,

subtitles.original: 4期生のトワ ルーナ わために捧げた楽曲です
subtitles.english: it's a song I dedicated to 4th Gen's Towa, Luna, and Watame.

subtitles.original: 前を向いて 笑顔で
subtitles.english: Looking forward, with a smile,

subtitles.original: この楽曲で活動を最後にしたいと思います
subtitles.english: I want to make this song the finale of my activities.

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください 「キセキ結び」
subtitles.english: Please listen. 'Kiseki Musubi' (Miracle Knot).

subtitles.original: 約束しようよ
subtitles.english: Let's make a promise.

subtitles.original: 僕ら出逢えた奇跡
subtitles.english: The miracle that we met,

subtitles.original: 忘れないように
subtitles.english: so that we never forget it.

subtitles.original: 夢抱いて集う
subtitles.english: Gathering with dreams in our hearts,

subtitles.original: 青春アニメみたいな
subtitles.english: just like a coming-of-age anime.

subtitles.original: ハッピーなエンドになるかな
subtitles.english: Will it have a happy ending?

subtitles.original: 耐え飛ぶよ
subtitles.english: I'll endure and fly.

subtitles.original: 寝惚け眼欠伸して
subtitles.english: Yawning with sleepy eyes,

subtitles.original: 今日は何をしようか
subtitles.english: 'What shall we do today?'

subtitles.original: 永久に続く海を駆ける
subtitles.english: Running across the sea that lasts forever.

subtitles.original: 今は溜息
subtitles.english: Right now, rather than sighs,

subtitles.original: よりも勇気を
subtitles.english: I need courage.

subtitles.original: 諦めるなんてないの
subtitles.english: Giving up is not an option.

subtitles.original: ここで歌う
subtitles.english: I sing here.

subtitles.original: 僕の声は聴こえてますか
subtitles.english: Can you hear my voice?

subtitles.original: 君に届け
subtitles.english: Let it reach you.

subtitles.original: 学校の友達じゃ きっとない出会いだった
subtitles.english: It was an encounter that surely wouldn't happen as school friends.

subtitles.original: 画面の先の遥か遠くまで
subtitles.english: Far beyond the screen, to the distance.

subtitles.original: ささくれた言葉も 誰かの笑顔になる
subtitles.english: Even harsh words can turn into someone's smile.

subtitles.original: それぞれの色で 星結ぶ軌跡
subtitles.english: With our own colors, the path connecting stars.

subtitles.original: キラキラ輝くステージに 連れてくよ
subtitles.english: I'll take you to the sparkling, shining stage.

subtitles.original: 泣いて笑ってはしゃいで
subtitles.english: Crying, laughing, having fun,

subtitles.original: 毎日ジェットコースター
subtitles.english: every day is a roller coaster.

subtitles.original: たまには寝転んで お昼寝しよう
subtitles.english: Sometimes, let's lie down and take a nap.

subtitles.original: ちょっと自信ないとき
subtitles.english: When you lack a little confidence,

subtitles.original: ことりってデュエットして
subtitles.english: I'll tweet and duet with you.

subtitles.original: 今日だけは泣いちゃうこと 許してね
subtitles.english: Please forgive me for crying just for today.

subtitles.original: 未来の僕が
subtitles.english: The future me

subtitles.original: アルバム開く
subtitles.english: opens the album.

subtitles.original: 傷ついた写真だって 宝物だ
subtitles.english: Even the damaged photos are treasures.

subtitles.original: 僕の愛が見えていますか
subtitles.english: Can you see my love?

subtitles.original: 君に届け
subtitles.english: Let it reach you.

subtitles.original: 過去も喝采も 性格も違うけれど
subtitles.english: Though our pasts, cheers, and personalities are different,

subtitles.original: 弱気なときは瞼 ぎゅっと瞑り
subtitles.english: when you're feeling weak, squeeze your eyelids shut.

subtitles.original: もう一回 もう一回 絶対に諦めない
subtitles.english: One more time, one more time, I absolutely won't give up.

subtitles.original: 前の背中追う ヘッポコな僕でも
subtitles.english: Chasing the back in front of me, even if I'm clumsy,

subtitles.original: 君の隣に居たくて 走るの
subtitles.english: I run because I want to be by your side.

subtitles.original: 誰にも言えずに
subtitles.english: Without being able to tell anyone,

subtitles.original: 描いた夢が 例え叶わないとしても
subtitles.english: even if the dreams I drew don't come true,

subtitles.original: ボロボロの靴でも
subtitles.english: even with worn-out shoes,

subtitles.original: カッコよくなくても
subtitles.english: even if it's not cool,

subtitles.original: あの日の僕ならなんて言う？
subtitles.english: what would the 'me' from that day say?

subtitles.original: 止まらないで
subtitles.english: 'Don't stop.'

subtitles.original: 初めて僕ら出逢った日
subtitles.english: The day we first met,

subtitles.original: まるで昨日みたいに思い出すけど
subtitles.english: I remember it like it was yesterday, but

subtitles.original: もう行こうか
subtitles.english: shall we go now?

subtitles.original: 最後に今 重なる奇跡
subtitles.english: Now, at the end, the overlapping miracles.

subtitles.original: 僕の声は聴こえてますか
subtitles.english: Can you hear my voice?

subtitles.original: 君に届け
subtitles.english: Let it reach you.

subtitles.original: 黒板のメッセージ 桜の風
subtitles.english: The message on the blackboard, the cherry blossom wind...
